perForBalance.info: Top percentage of all holder regarding the account's balance for this specific token

amountForBalance.info: amount of the account's balance for this specific token

perForActivity.info: Top percentage of all holder regarding the account's activity. where an activity is defined by transactions that contain incoming or outgoing token transfers related to the account

amountForSHOTop.info: amount of the account's balance for this specific token

perForSHOTop.info: Top percentage of all holder regarding the account's balance for this specific token

perForSHOBottom.info: Bottom percentage of all holder regarding the account's activity. where an activity is defined by transactions that contain incoming or outgoing token transfers related to the account

startDateForHighActivity.info: The default time period is from the contract created to present

startDateForSHO.info: The default time period is from the contract created to present
